title: Taric, the 'Shield of Valoran', has no shield.
body: I like the update otherwise, and that Armor of the Fifth Age splash is the best, but I really want to know why this change was made. It's not like his shield is vitally important to him or anything; it's just a weird change for no real benefit that I can see.

replies.body: Taric doesn't have "the shield of valoran", he *is* the shield. Having no shield for himself shows his sacrifice of using himself to protect others.

Well how else is he gonna cast spells without a free hand?  He doesn't have the war caster feat I imagine.

But in all seriousness, he doesn't need a shield because he _is_ the shield.
And all his abilities are now star or celestial based...
